Class PTZService

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.onvifptz.Service
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.onvifptz.PTZService
public class PTZService extends Service
Service for ONVIF PTZ messages
Author:
Ethan Beauclaire

    • getContinuousMoveDocument

      public Document getContinuousMoveDocument(String profile, String xVel, String yVel, String zVel)
      Document builder function for ContinuousMove

    • continuousMove

      public String continuousMove(String profile, String x, String y, String z) throws IOException
      Sends a continuous move operation to the PTZ node; currently uses hard-coded MediaProfile token
      Parameters:
      profile - the profile to send the operation to
      x - the x value (pan speed) of the move [-1.0, 1.0]
      y - the y value (tilt speed) of the move [-1.0, 1.0]
      z - the zoom speed of the move [-1.0, 1.0]
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getRelativeMoveDocument

      public Document getRelativeMoveDocument(String profile, float x, float y, float z)
      Document builder function for RelativeMove

    • relativeMove

      public String relativeMove(String profile, float x, float y, float z) throws IOException
      Sends a relative move operation to the PTZ node; currently uses hard-coded MediaProfile token
      Parameters:
      x - the x value (pan) of the move [-1.0, 1.0]
      y - the y value (tilt) of the move [-1.0, 1.0]
      z - the zoom of the move [-1.0, 1.0]
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getPresetsDocument

      public Document getPresetsDocument(String profile)
      Document builder function for GetPresets

    • getPresets

      public String getPresets(String profile) throws IOException
      Gets the list of PTZ presets for the PTZNode of the selected MediaProfile; currently uses hardcoded profile token.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • presetExists

      public boolean presetExists(String profileToken, String pToken) throws IOException
      Checks if a PTZ preset exists
      Parameters:
      profileToken - reference to the media profile
      pToken - reference token to the saved PTZ preset
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getPresetToken

      public String getPresetToken(String profileToken, String pName) throws IOException
      Returns the token of the first preset with a given name, or null
      Parameters:
      profileToken - reference to the media profile
      pName - name of the saved PTZ preset
      Throws:
      IOException

    • gotoPreset

      public String gotoPreset(String profileToken, String pName) throws IOException
      Point the camera in a saved preset direction for the PTZNode of selected MediaProfile
      Parameters:
      profileToken - reference to the media profile
      pName - name of the saved PTZ preset
      Throws:
      IOException

    • removePreset

      public String removePreset(String profileToken, String pToken) throws IOException
      Removes the preset designated by pToken
      Parameters:
      profileToken - reference to the media profile
      pToken - unique reference token for the PTZ preset
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setPreset

      public String setPreset(String profileToken, String pName) throws IOException
      Saves the current position to a preset Calling this will overwrite existing preset with matching name
      Parameters:
      profileToken - reference to the media profile
      pName - name for PTZ preset
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setWiper

      public String setWiper(String profileToken, String state) throws IOException
      Calls SendAuxiliaryCommand, setting the wiper value
      Parameters:
      profileToken - reference to the media profile
      state - the requested state ("On", "Off") of the wiper
      Throws:
      IOException
